snippet: Enormous reserves of gold and copper will bring prosperity, but at a human, cultural and environmental cost.
abstract: Khanbogd Journal; Oyu Tolgoi mine project in Khanbogd, Mongolia, a joint venture with Canada's Turquoise Hill Resources and Mongolian government, has drastically changed area around the remote town, for good and ill, even before its scheduled opening.
lead_paragraph: Enormous reserves of gold and copper will bring prosperity, but at a human, cultural and environmental cost.

headline.seo: Oyu Tolgoi Mine in Khanbogd Is Transforming Mongolia
headline.main: Though Not Yet Open, a Huge Mine Is Transforming Mongolia’s Landscape
headline.print_headline: Though Not Yet Open, a Huge Mine Is Transforming Mongolia’s Landscape
